entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Ottawa (Richmond - Metcalfe)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:30 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 1:00 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: NE 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
